alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 1:07AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Perry, northwestern Garland, east central Scott, Yell and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 107 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Muddy Creek WMA, or 13 miles north of Mount Ida, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danville... Ola... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Plainview in Yell County... Muddy Creek WMA... Belleville... Corinth... Ranger... Wing... Kingston... Bluffton... Rover... Story... Sunlight Bay Park... Spring Lake Campground... Carter Cove Park... Chula... Macedonia in Yell County... Gibbs... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Garland; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations
